com.appboy.models

Interface IInAppMessageImmersive

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IInAppMessage
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    InAppMessageFull, InAppMessageImmersiveBase, InAppMessageModal

    public interface IInAppMessageImmersive
extends IInAppMessage
    InAppMessageBase is the base model interface for all immersive in-app messages. An immersive in-app message is defined as an in-app message that takes up the entire screen and/or 'blocks' the user from interacting with the app until the message is dismissed. Immersive messages extend the base in-app message with header text, message buttons, and a close button. Known implementing classes include InAppMessageImmersiveBase InAppMessageModal InAppMessageFull
